name: Michael Scot
description:
Laid back easy to get along with,I can’t think of any one person but my creator, but I surround myself with good people that help influence me to be the decent person I am today.
I enjoy going to the movies with my kids, mountain biking, fishing, I enjoy visiting the Biltmore Estate, exploring on the Blue Ridge parkway and chasing waterfalls.
Although I’m a bit of an analytical thinker, I do have a compassionate side to me and enjoy good conversation with the company of others.
I enjoy travel. I enjoy outdoor activities,Except for my teens I have never worked for anyone but myself I enjoy building and fixing anything. I enjoy long walks hikes holding hands. Wine bars quaint restaurants. Making dinner with my partner. Romantic evenings, days, mornings.that an intimate relationship is between one man and one woman. One who is financially responsible and loves family. A man who keeps fit thru exercise or an active life style. Someone who will be themselves and agree we wont try to change the other.
Originally grew up in Budapest Hungary and having being living in the States for 17 years. I have a stable personal life By the Grace of God.
Friends see me as a person with integrity and genuine. I am as respectful, honest, trustworthy, dependable, caring and strong moral character as you can find in a person. I have some introvert personality but have a great sense of humor, enjoy having fun and being around people. I’m a christian with conservative views and values. I believe in a healthy lifestyle, no tattoos, and never experimented with illegal substances.
